results.adx_keywords: Law and Legislation;United States Politics and Government;Storming of the US Capitol (Jan, 2021);Electoral Count Act (1887);Presidential Election of 2020;Collins, Susan M;Klobuchar, Amy;Biden, Joseph R Jr;Pence, Mike;Trump, Donald J
results.title: House Passes Overhaul of Electoral Count, Moving to Avert Another Jan. 6 Crisis
results.abstract: The legislation, opposed by most Republicans, is a bid to update the law that former President Donald J. Trump tried to exploit on Jan. 6, 2021, to invalidate his defeat.

media.caption: Vice President Mike Pence and Speaker Nancy Pelosi presiding over the counting of Electoral College votes in the Capitol on Jan. 6, 2021. The legislation would define the vice president’s role as strictly ministerial.

results.adx_keywords: Social Media;Video Recordings, Downloads and Streaming;Computers and the Internet;Rumors and Misinformation;Drugs (Pharmaceuticals);Hazardous and Toxic Substances;News and News Media;4chan;Food and Drug Administration;TikTok (ByteDance);United States
results.byline: By Daniel Victor and Amanda Holpuch
results.title: F.D.A. Warning on NyQuil Chicken Alerts Many to Existence of NyQuil Chicken
results.abstract: Cooking poultry in cold medicine is a bad, dangerous idea that few people seemed to be aware of until the government warning attracted media coverage.

media.caption: No one should consume NyQuil chicken, and there is little evidence anyone actually has.

results.title: Migrants Who Were Flown to Martha’s Vineyard Sue Florida Governor
results.abstract: The Venezuelans who unexpectedly found themselves on a Massachusetts island say in their suit that Florida officials made “made false promises and false representations” to them.

media.caption: The lawsuit against the Florida governor and other state officials came less than a week after roughly 50 Venezuelan migrants were taken from Texas to Martha’s Vineyard in Massachusetts.

results.title: With His 60th Home Run, Aaron Judge Continues March on History
results.abstract: Judge, the Yankees’ superstar outfielder, became the sixth player to reach the milestone and is one short of tying Roger Maris’s American League record of 61.

media.caption: With his ninth inning home run on Tuesday, Aaron Judge joined Barry Bonds, Mark McGwire, Sammy Sosa, Roger Maris and Babe Ruth as the only players to hit 60 home runs in a single season.

results.title: A Finnish Scholar Wants to Change How We See American History
results.abstract: In “Indigenous Continent,” Pekka Hamalainen aims to upend the nation’s grand narrative, putting Native people and Native power at the center.

media.caption: The Finnish historian Pekka Hamalainen, in Oxford, England. His book “Indigenous Continent” describes a “four-centuries-long war,” in which Native Americans “won as often as not.”
